articles.title: The Switch 2 is still on sale at multiple retailers if you missed out during Cyber Monday - The Verge
articles.description: The Switch 2 is still relatively new, so deals are rare. However, you can still get Nintendo’s latest console with a free copy of Mario Kart World for a limited time.

articles.title: Testing shows why the Steam Machine’s 8GB of graphics RAM could be a problem - Ars Technica
articles.description: Valve has work to do on the software side—but some fixes are coming.

articles.title: Epic Games Store decides "at the last minute" not to distribute Horses - GamesIndustry.biz
articles.description: Epic Games Store is the latest online storefront to withdraw support for the provocative indie game, Horses.

articles.title: Red Dead Redemption Out Now on Netflix, iOS, Android, PS5, Xbox Series, and Nintendo Switch 2 - Rockstar Games
articles.description: Experience John Marston's journey across the sprawling expanses of the American West and Mexico to hunt down the remaining members of the Van der Linde Gang in Red Dead Redemption along with his fight to stop a virulent zombie plague in Undead...

articles.title: Samsung reveals Galaxy Z TriFold with 10-inch foldable screen, astronomical price - Ars Technica
articles.description: Samsung’s long-awaited tri-fold phone is launching in Korea this month, with a US launch early next year.

articles.title: YouTube releases its first-ever recap of videos you’ve watched - TechCrunch
articles.description: YouTube Recap features a set of up to 12 different cards that highlight a user's top channels, interests, the evolution of their viewing habits, and which personality type they fall into based on the videos they loved to watch.

articles.title: ‘Destiny 2: Renegades’ Begins The Strangest ‘Star Wars’ Experiment To Date - Forbes
articles.description: Destiny 2 is taking a huge swing with a licensed Star Wars expansion that does not actually function as a Star Wars game in Renegades.

articles.title: Fallout 76: Burning Springs Release Notes - Bethesda.net
articles.description: Grab your duster, hat, and your favorite weapon because it’s time for some Bounty Hunting! Explore our largest map addition yet and hunt down some of the largest bounties Burning Springs has to offer.

articles.title: Elden Ring Nightreign's DLC is "definitely a little bit harder" than the main game, "but it's not ridiculous", says director - Eurogamer
articles.description: The Forsaken Hollows, the forthcoming DLC for Elden Ring spin-off Nightreign, is "definitely a little bit harder" than the main game, its director has admitted.

articles.title: Meet Amar Subramanya, the 46-year-old Google and Microsoft veteran who will steer Apple AI strategy - Fortune
articles.description: “We are pleased to welcome Amar to Craig’s leadership team and to bring his extraordinary AI expertise to Apple,” CEO Tim Cook said in a statement.

articles.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A Mega Dimension DLC Trailer Reveals a Surprise Second Mega Evolution For a Fan-Favorite Pokémon - ign.com
articles.description: A new trailer for Pokémon Legends: Z-A has revealed a surprise new Mega Evolution for the fan-favorite Lucario, and announced a new side mission that will unlock an encounter with Mewtwo.

articles.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a technical marvel and game design nightmare - NPR
articles.description: After a decade of development, Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a beautiful but befuddling game full of misguided design decisions and annoying sidekicks.

articles.title: The 25 Best Video Games of 2025 - Rolling Stone
articles.description: 'Expedition 33,' 'ARC Raiders,' and 'Donkey Kong Bananza' are among the games that defined 2025

articles.title: Grotmas Calendar Day 2 – The Helsmiths of Hashut join the battle for Ghyran - Warhammer Community
articles.description: A scourge on the Realm of Life.

articles.title: Ask the Developer Vol. 20: Drag x Drive — Part 1 - Nintendo
articles.description: This article has been translated from the original Japanese content. In this 20th volume of Ask the Developer, an interview series in which developers convey in their own words Nintendo's thoughts about creating products and the unusual details they…

articles.title: Delayed Marvel Cosmic Invasion achievements finally arrive on Xbox - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Marvel Cosmic Invasion is out now on Xbox Game Pass, and after an annoying delay, we can now reveal its list of Xbox achievements.

articles.title: Lexus Sports Car Will Be Unveiled Together With The GR GT - Carscoops
articles.description: Toyota has teased three new sports cars, including the GR GT and what appears to be the production-ready Lexus Sport Concept

articles.title: Updated Android Security Bulletin sets stage for a hefty December 2025 security patch - Android Authority
articles.description: The Android Security Bulletin for December 2025 is live, listing dozens of new vulnerabilities impacting device with Android 13 and above.
